VIDEO | Hindi language row: Former MP Dinesh Lal Yadav says, "I think there should not be any debate over this. Hindi is a medium for communication. Every state has its own language. My language is Bhojpuri, while some use Marathi, Tamil, Bengali to communicate. However, we use Hindi to communicate with each other. So, those who are doing politics over this is extremely wrong." 

(Full video available on PTI Videos - 
ptivideos.com)
